page.title: 15ANDREW'S SCHOOL DAY.
page.content: THE DAY IS MONDAY,I WAKE UP AT SEVEN O'CLOCK, I HAVE A CUP OF TEA THEN I CRAWL INTO MY SCHOOL CLOTHES,AT SEVEN THIRTY I WALK DOWN THE STAIRS AND INTO THE KITCHEN FOR MY BREAKFAST,I USUALLY HAVE WEETABIX AND TOAST, I ALWAYS READ THE PAPER WHILE EATING, I THINK THIS IS VERY CIVILISED. AT FIVE TO EIGHT I WALK DOWN TO THE BUS STOP IT IS NOT VERY FAR AND IT ONLY TAKES A FEW MINUTES.AT THE BUS STOP I MEET A FEW FRIENDS AND TALK UNTIL THE BUS COMES(ABOUT FIVE PAST EIGHT)I SIT NEAR THE BACK WITH A BOY CALLED 'MARK'. THE RIDE TO SCHOOL IS ALWAYS UNEVENTFUL AND WHEN WE GET TO SCHOOL WE GO INTO THE PLAY GROUND AND WAIT.WHEN THE BELL GOES WE GO TO OUR FORM ROOM WHICH IS THE BIOLOGY LAB.
